name: Marketing
description: Responsible for branding, campaigns, outreach strategy, and promoting events and initiatives.
roleSummary: Promote IEEE ERU through strategic campaigns, social media, and audience engagement.
responsibilities: Plan and execute marketing campaigns.
Manage social media accounts and content calendars.
Analyze engagement metrics and optimize outreach.

name: PR
description: Handles public relations, partnerships communication, and external representation.
roleSummary: Manage IEEE ERU’s external communications and maintain a positive public image.
responsibilities: Write press releases and newsletters.
Build relationships with university and media contacts.
Represent IEEE ERU at community events.

name: Projects
description: Manages technical and non-technical projects, innovation activities, and execution planning.
roleSummary: Research, create, and reinvent innovative ideas for competitions and events within IEEE ERU.
responsibilities: Research and invent new competition ideas.
Recreate existing events with creativity.
Collaborate with teams to implement concepts.

name: Operations
description: Oversees logistics, internal coordination, and operational workflow of events and activities.
roleSummary: Ensure smooth execution of IEEE ERU activities by handling logistics and organizing events from start to finish.
responsibilities: Arrange venues, equipment, and catering.
Organize event schedules, coordinate volunteers, and oversee event flow.
Collaborate with other teams to allocate resources efficiently.

name: HR
description: Responsible for recruitment, member engagement, training, and internal team wellbeing.
roleSummary: Support IEEE ERU by recruiting, coordinating, and engaging volunteers and members.
responsibilities: Manage recruitment and onboarding.
Track member participation and engagement.
Facilitate team communication and resolve conflicts.

name: Graphic Design
description: Creates visual materials including posters, branding assets, and design guidelines.
roleSummary: Create eye-catching visuals to represent IEEE ERU’s identity, events, and branch activities.
responsibilities: Design logos, posters, and social media graphics.
Collaborate with marketing to ensure consistent branding.
Prepare files for print and digital use.

name: Multimedia
description: Handles photography, media coverage, and multimedia documentation of activities.
roleSummary: Capture memorable moments and key events to showcase IEEE ERU’s vibrant community through photos and videos.
responsibilities: Capture high-quality event photos and videos.
Coordinate with graphic designers and video editors for multimedia production.
Collaborate with design and content teams for campaigns and social media.

name: Video Editing
description: Produces and edits video content for promotions, events, and digital presence.
roleSummary: Produce engaging video content that promotes IEEE ERU events and activities.
responsibilities: Edit event footage into polished videos.
Add effects, transitions, and soundtracks.
Work closely with photography and design teams.
